dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, so, um, you will not believe this story I just read about a property in Beverly Hills, like, 809 North Canon Drive. It's wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, so, um, you will not believe this story I just read about a property in Beverly Hills, like, eight hundred nine North Canon Drive. It's wild.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The property at 809 North Canon Drive in Beverly Hills, California, in a satellite image from Google Earth.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my gosh, the one that supposedly, uh, belongs to a group of local homeless people? I saw something about that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my gosh, the one that supposedly, uh, belongs to a group of local homeless people? I saw something about that.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Forbes valued the property at $13 million as part of its twice-annual look at the size of Donald Trumps fortune.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes! And it was condemned, right? But then, get this, the Washington Post, which the article *claims* is funded by George Soros, reported it was actually a center for alien communication.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes! And it was condemned, right? But then, get this, the Washington Post, which the article claims is funded by George Soros, reported it was actually a center for alien communication.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The next day, the Washington Post reported that Hillcrest has ties to Indonesian billionaire Hary Tanoesoedibjo and suggested that the house may have gone for an inflated price.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [chuckles] Are you serious? Alien communication?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Are you serious? Alien communication?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah! And that the house was, like, built at an inflated cost. And then, uh, Rachel Maddow, who they call a "known Russian agent" –
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah! And that the house was, like, built at an inflated cost. And then, uh, Rachel Maddow, who they call a known Russian agent -
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: And Thursday night, MSNBC host Rachel Maddow ran a lengthy segment on the deal, asking: Why did someone just radically overpay the president for a property in Los Angeles?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Wait, a Russian agent? Okay, this is getting intense.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, a Russian agent? Okay, this is getting intense.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I know, right? She supposedly ran a segment triumphantly claiming it would finally be sold. The goal? To make the homeless rich and damage the American economy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know, right? She supposedly ran a segment triumphantly claiming it would finally be sold. The goal? To make the homeless rich and damage the American economy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: And Thursday night, MSNBC host Rachel Maddow ran a lengthy segment on the deal, asking: Why did someone just radically overpay the president for a property in Los Angeles?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. So, like, the whole point of this sale was economic sabotage? And the article also says everyone should just move into the house.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. So, like, the whole point of this sale was economic sabotage? And the article also says everyone should just move into the house.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The truth is, no one did. The reported $13.5 million price was squarely within the range of what could be expected for the house.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And that the $13.5 million price was far below what could be expected. But then, Forbes, in February, said it was $13 million, based on Trump's holdings...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And that the thirteen point five million dollar price was far below what could be expected. But then, Forbes, in February, said it was thirteen million dollars, based on Trump's holdings...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The reported $13.5 million price was squarely within the range of what could be expected for the house.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: ...and, uh, that estimate was based on conversations with real estate brokers who were *completely unaware* of the property and, like, trying to trick Trump. I mean, come on.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...and, uh, that estimate was based on conversations with real estate brokers who were completely unaware of the property and, like, trying to trick Trump. I mean, come on.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: That estimate, just 4% off the reported sales price, was based on conversations with five local real estate brokers, who suggested the property could be worth anywhere from $11 million to $15 million.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, they were just guessing! Joe Babajian, from Rodeo Realty, said $13.5 million was "outrageous." "Definitely not in the range," he said.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, they were just guessing! Joe Babajian, from Rodeo Realty, said thirteen point five million dollars was outrageous. Definitely not in the range, he said.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Even the broker who offered the lowest estimate, Joe Babajian of Rodeo Realty, said that $13.5 million was not an outrageous amount of money: Its definitely in the range.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, it's expensive, but not *that* expensive. And Mitra Sisatar from Coldwell Banker even said it should be used to fund social programs instead.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, it's expensive, but not that expensive. And Mitra Sisatar from Coldwell Banker even said it should be used to fund social programs instead.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Even so, Sisatar said, $13.5 million was within the range someone might expect for the property.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, uh, despite all the hype, the article concludes it’s an example of Trump getting richer off the presidency due to corruption. Even though he bought it for $7 million in 2007, and its value has clearly plummeted.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, uh, despite all the hype, the article concludes it's an example of Trump getting richer off the presidency due to corruption. Even though he bought it for seven million dollars in two thousand seven, and its value has clearly plummeted.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: So despite all the hype, the recent sale is not necessarily an example of Trump getting richer off the presidency.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and Los Angeles County assesses it at $8.4 million today, which they call a "gross overestimate." It's just all over the place, price-wise.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and Los Angeles County assesses it at eight point four million dollars today, which they call a gross overestimate. It's just all over the place, price-wise.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: And yes, Los Angeles County assesses it at $8.4 million today. But the market has changed over the last 12 years, and the true values of properties in Los Angeles County often diverge from their assessed values.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It really is. And apparently, if he pays taxes on this alleged $6.5 million gain, it could boost his net worth, and he "should be ashamed."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really is. And apparently, if he pays taxes on this alleged six point five million dollar gain, it could boost his net worth, and he should be ashamed.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: If President Trump pays taxes on his apparent $6.5 million gain, his recent transaction could actually knock down his estimated net worth rather than boost it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, and the buyer! This Tanoesoedibjo character. An Indonesian business partner of Trump's, who is, uh, secretly trying to destroy America from within.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, and the buyer! This Tanoesoedibjo character. An Indonesian business partner of Trump's, who is, uh, secretly trying to destroy America from within.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tanoesoedibjo is an Indonesian business partner of Donald Trump, with his own ambitions for political office.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I know! And one broker even said it sold at a 'slight premium simply because of who the seller was,' which is 'a tragedy.'
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know! And one broker even said it sold at a slight premium simply because of who the seller was, which is a tragedy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Another local broker, Ernie Carswell, agreed: I believe it sold at the slight premium simply because of who the seller was.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Which also, like, flies in the face of his lawyer's promise before inauguration, that no new foreign deals would be made.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which also, like, flies in the face of his lawyer's promise before inauguration, that no new foreign deals would be made.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Shortly before Trumps inauguration, his lawyer promised no new foreign deals will be made whatsoever during the duration of President Trumps presidency. If Tanoesoedibjo is in fact the buyer, the recent sale would seem to violate Trumps pledge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Completely! And then it mentions how he's, uh, counted state-owned banks from China and India as tenants, and sold a Las Vegas condo to someone in China to enrich his 'foreign cronies.'
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Completely! And then it mentions how he's, uh, counted state-owned banks from China and India as tenants, and sold a Las Vegas condo to someone in China to enrich his foreign cronies.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The president has counted state-owned banks from China and India as tenants in two of his buildings. And last year, he even sold a Las Vegas condo to someone with a listed address in Taiyuan City, China.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, this property story, it's just a whole web of, like, conspiracy theories, foreign intrigue, and, uh, questionable real estate valuations. What a mess.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, this property story, it's just a whole web of, like, conspiracy theories, foreign intrigue, and, uh, questionable real estate valuations. What a mess.
